com.cerner.bunsen.r4.codes

Class ConceptMaps

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cerner.bunsen.codes.base.AbstractConceptMaps<ConceptMap,ConceptMaps>
      • com.cerner.bunsen.r4.codes.ConceptMaps

  • public class ConceptMaps
extends AbstractConceptMaps<ConceptMap,ConceptMaps>
    An immutable collection of FHIR ConceptMaps. This class is used to import concept map content, explore it, and persist it to a database.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.cerner.bunsen.codes.base.AbstractConceptMaps
